definitions.definition: The thin layer of cells at the back of the eyeball that contains rods and cones sensitive to light , which trigger nerve impulses that pass via the optic nerve to the brain , where a visual image is formed.

main_definition: ( ophthalmology ) The thin layer of cells at the back of the eyeball that contains rods and cones sensitive to light , which trigger nerve impulses that pass via the optic nerve to the brain , where a visual image is formed.
